rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0001
rows.name: Are you ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0002
rows.name: Yes! I'll do my best![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0003
rows.name: That's reassuring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0004
rows.name: Leave it to me![ST:wait

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0005
rows.name: It is unusual to be chosen as White Whale crew at that age.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0006
rows.name: Lin, what about yor family?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0007
rows.name:
They died.
Both my father and mother[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0008
rows.name: On the day Earth was attacked by the aliens[ST:wide ]―?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0009
rows.name: Before that[ST:wide ]― It was an accident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0010
rows.name: I see[ST:wide ]― Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0011
rows.name: It's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0012
rows.name:
My parents
were design engineers on the White Whale project.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0013
rows.name: But there was an accident during the main engine test...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0014
rows.name:
But because my parents and
lots of other people worked hard,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0015
rows.name: the White Whale could fly into space...[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0015_2
rows.name:
So they didn't die in vain.
At least, that's what I like to think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0016
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0017
rows.name:
To repay the work of your great parents,
they took you on as staff, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Thanks to that, I feel really fulfilled now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0019
rows.name: Because I can do work that protects everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0020
rows.name: Lao, that's not quite right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0021
rows.name:
The reason she could become crew so young
was because she had the knowledge and talent for White Whale operations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Being in an environment where she had easy access to materials
was thanks to her parents, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0023
rows.name: It's unrelated to the assessment of her abilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0024
rows.name: Elma-san...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Seems I was insensitive.
Sorry, forgive me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0026
rows.name:
What are you saying?
Someone like me is still only half-fledged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06060100_MSG0027
rows.name: Okay, let's get going![ST:wait ]
